meanings.definition: A person who believes in or predicts the imminent destruction of the world.
meanings.sent1: The apocalyptist warned of the end of the world.
meanings.sent2: The apocalyptist's predictions about the world's end were unsettling.
meanings.sent3: The apocalyptist's doomsday party had a dark sense of humor.
meanings.sent4: Her reputation as an apocalyptist made her seem like a modern-day prophet.
meanings.sent5: The apocalyptist's words echoed with a sense of impending doom.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to apocalyptic beliefs or predictions.
meanings.sent1: The apocalyptist literature was filled with tales of destruction.
meanings.sent2: His apocalyptist views colored his perception of the future.
meanings.sent3: The apocalyptist-themed movie was surprisingly popular.
meanings.sent4: The apocalyptist imagery in the painting was haunting.
meanings.sent5: The apocalyptist tone of the speech left the audience uneasy.
